textBeforeTable: April Fools' Day 2010 roundup on Planet Half-Life. April Fools' Day 2010 roundup on GameSpot. 'Epic Sesame Street' Announced. FilePlanet: Duke Nukem Forever Demo. Get it? Ant). textAfterTable: 4. Re: File Info: Duke Nukem Forever Demo Apr 5, 2010, 01:04 Nucas   banddirector wrote on Apr 4, 2010, 16:52: So what's in the actual file? I don't want to take the time to dl it .... handily, from the planet half life april fools roundup: "FilePlanet tweeted that the Duke Nukem Forever demo had been released. The zip in the linked download contained some old .wav files of classic Duke voices."
